SELECT T2.EXPCNO, T2.ANALYZEDATE, T2.REPLTEXT, T2.QUESTEXT
FROM T_EXPCTEXT T2 WHERE T2.EXPCNO = #{expcno}
SELECT DISTINCT REPLORGNAME FROM T_EXPCLIST ORDER BY CONVERT (REPLORGNAME, 'ISO2022-KR')

SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCount
FROM (SELECT T1.EXPCNO, T1.ITEMNAME, T1.ITEMNO, T1.QUESORGCODE, T1.QUESORGNAME, T1.REPLORGCODE, T1.REPLORGNAME, T1.REPLYDATE, T1.CLASSNAME, T1.DETAILLINK, T2.ANALYZEDATE, T2.ANALYZEORGNAME, T2.CAREORGCODE, T2.REGDATE, T2.QUESTEXT, T2.REPLTEXT, T2.REASONTEXT
FROM( SELECT EXPCNO, ITEMNAME, ITEMNO, QUESORGCODE, QUESORGNAME, REPLORGCODE, REPLORGNAME, REPLYDATE, CLASSNAME, DETAILLINK
FROM( SELECT EXPCNO, ITEMNAME, ITEMNO, QUESORGCODE, QUESORGNAME, REPLORGCODE, REPLORGNAME, REPLYDATE, CLASSNAME, DETAILLINK
FROM T_EXPCLIST
WHERE REPLYDATE >= #{fromdate_search})
WHERE REPLYDATE <= #{today_search} ) T1
FROM T_EXPCLIST T1
, T_EXPCTEXT T2 WHERE T1.EXPCNO = T2.EXPCNO(+)
AND T1.ITEMNAME LIKE '%' || #{itemname} || '%'
AND T1.ITEMNO LIKE '%' || #{itemno} || '%'
AND T2.QUESTEXT LIKE '%' || #{question} || '%'
AND T2.REASONTEXT LIKE '%' || #{reason} || '%'
AND T2.REPLTEXT LIKE '%' || #{reply} || '%'
AND T1.QUESORGNAME LIKE '%' || #{questionorganization} || '%'
AND REPLYDATE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY REPLYDATE DESC )

SELECT * FROM (SELECT EXPCNO, ITEMNAME, ITEMNO, QUESORGCODE, QUESORGNAME, REPLORGCODE, REPLORGNAME, REPLYDATE, CLASSNAME, DETAILLINK, ANALYZEDATE, QUESTEXT, REPLTEXT, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT T1.ITEMNAME, T1.ITEMNO, T1.QUESORGCODE, T1.QUESORGNAME, T1.REPLORGCODE, T1.REPLORGNAME, T1.REPLYDATE, T1.CLASSNAME, T1.DETAILLINK, T1.EXPCNO, T2.ANALYZEDATE, T2.ANALYZEORGNAME, T2.CAREORGCODE, T2.REGDATE, T2.QUESTEXT, T2.REPLTEXT, T2.REASONTEXT
FROM( SELECT EXPCNO, ITEMNAME, ITEMNO, QUESORGCODE, QUESORGNAME, REPLORGCODE, REPLORGNAME, REPLYDATE, CLASSNAME, DETAILLINK FROM( SELECT EXPCNO, ITEMNAME, ITEMNO, QUESORGCODE, QUESORGNAME, REPLORGCODE, REPLORGNAME, REPLYDATE, CLASSNAME, DETAILLINK
FROM T_EXPCLIST T1
WHERE REPLYDATE >= #{fromdate_search})
WHERE REPLYDATE <= #{today_search} ) T1
FROM T_EXPCLIST T1
, T_EXPCTEXT T2 WHERE T1.EXPCNO = T2.EXPCNO(+)
AND T1.ITEMNAME LIKE '%' || #{itemname} || '%'
AND T1.ITEMNO LIKE '%' || #{itemno} || '%'
AND T2.QUESTEXT LIKE '%' || #{question} || '%'
AND T2.REASONTEXT LIKE '%' || #{reason} || '%'
AND T2.REPLTEXT LIKE '%' || #{reply} || '%'
AND T1.QUESORGNAME LIKE '%' || #{questionorganization} || '%'
AND REPLYDATE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY REPLYDATE DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{lastIndex} )
WHERE RNUM > #{firstIndex}

UPDATE T_EXPCTEXT SET ANALYZEDATE = #{analyzedate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUESTEXT = #{questext, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPLTEXT = #{repltext, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE EXPCNO = #{expcno}
